body: Hi everyone,  I'm getting an error from the Recolor mesh component. The error says" the length of the results[=1] is not equal to the number of mesh faces [=218]. I don't see a reason to have such an error because I did input 218 faces to the mesh input. Please see attached picture[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/DhFoEGRtzw6iEwM5xxaYAaiuXv7WA3KeU3Wtk*tyJV7bTQfPfcn8OMkYMfv5sWQptPN7a1B8ZZfK9zczK*3KWB5Q8ehbIPQ*/Canvasat162631.png)
